message: This proposal divides the money equally, considering the risk of inflation in future rounds.
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
I propose a 60-40 split, hoping to balance the risk and reward for both of us.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not giving up the majority!
Equal division seems fair, given the diminishing value of our shares with each passing round.
You're not getting the better deal, take it or leave it!
A slightly skewed split towards you might encourage acceptance, while still providing a reasonable share for me.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving in yet!
A balanced split might finally lead to an agreement, given the significant decrease in value over the rounds.
